title: Celestial Cascade Haaram Set
materials: Crafted in 18K Rose and White Gold
meticulously set with brilliant-cut Cubic Zirconia. Features a durable and lustrous Hyderabadi polish for enhanced shine and longevity.
features: This contemporary Haaram features a tiered design with geometric square and teardrop motifs. The open-work design gives a light and airy feel while maximizing sparkle. The matching earrings echo the necklace's aesthetic, culminating in a modified Jhumka silhouette. Its structure is crafted with an eye for detail.
colors: enhanced by the dazzling white sparkle of the Cubic Zirconia. These color shades exude timeless style.
occasions: or a grand reception. Its contemporary design also suits sophisticated evening events and upscale parties. Suitable for the new-age brides during Muhurtham.
description: A stunning blend of modern design and traditional aesthetics. The open-work design adds a touch of delicacy. High-quality materials and craftsmanship guarantee lasting beauty and elegance. The geometric pattern and light design ensure comfortable wear and make it a truly unique statement piece.
